titles.title: It Is Good For Me To Draw Nigh Unto God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
It is good for me to draw nigh unto God,
Lord, I put my trust in Thee.
That I might declare all Thy works, Oh Lord,
I put my trust in Thee.
My heart and my flesh, they fail me.
You are the strength of my life
And my portion both now and evermore.
There is none that I desire but Thee.
